languages.text: "Каким бы подонком он ни был, мне противно от одной мысли, что ты, ксенос, держишь его в столь жалком состоянии. Хватит".

traits.locale_text: "Каким бы подонком он ни был, мне противно от одной мысли, что ты, ксенос, держишь его в столь жалком состоянии. Хватит".

languages.text: "Reprobate though he was, the thought of you, a xenos, keeping him in such a wretched state is repulsive to me. No more."
languages.original_text: "Каким бы подонком он ни был, мне противно от одной мысли, что ты, ксенос, держишь его в столь жалком состоянии. Хватит".

traits.locale_text: "Reprobate though he was, the thought of you, a xenos, keeping him in such a wretched state is repulsive to me. No more."
"Reprobate though he was, the thought of you, a xenos, keeping him in such a wretched state is repulsive to me. No more."
"Reprobate though he was, the thought of you, a xenos, keeping him in such a wretched state is repulsive to me. No more."
"Reprobate though he was, the thought of you, a xenos, keeping him in such a wretched state is repulsive to me. No more."

languages.text: “尽管他是个人渣，但一想到他落在了你这个异形的手里，变成了这么可悲的样子，我就感觉恶心。我受够了。”
languages.original_text: "Reprobate though he was, the thought of you, a xenos, keeping him in such a wretched state is repulsive to me. No more."

traits.locale_text: “尽管他是个人渣，但一想到他落在了你这个异形的手里，变成了这么可悲的样子，我就感觉恶心。我受够了。”

languages.text: «Aunque fuera un réprobo, pensar que un xenos lo tiene en semejante estado me repugna. Basta ya».
languages.original_text: "Reprobate though he was, the thought of you, a xenos, keeping him in such a wretched state is repulsive to me. No more."

traits.locale_text: «Aunque fuera un réprobo, pensar que un xenos lo tiene en semejante estado me repugna. Basta ya».

languages.text: 「恥知らずで卑劣とはいえ、異種族であるお前が彼をこんな惨めな状態に置いていると思うと嫌悪感を覚える。いい加減にしてくれ」
languages.original_text: "Reprobate though he was, the thought of you, a xenos, keeping him in such a wretched state is repulsive to me. No more."

traits.locale_text: 「恥知らずで卑劣とはいえ、異種族であるお前が彼をこんな惨めな状態に置いていると思うと嫌悪感を覚える。いい加減にしてくれ」

languages.text: "Mag er auch noch so ein Schurke gewesen sein — der Gedanke, dass Ihr, ein Xenos, ihn in diesem jämmerlichen Zustand haltet, widert mich an. Schluss damit."
languages.original_text: "Reprobate though he was, the thought of you, a xenos, keeping him in such a wretched state is repulsive to me. No more."

traits.locale_text: "Mag er auch noch so ein Schurke gewesen sein — der Gedanke, dass Ihr, ein Xenos, ihn in diesem jämmerlichen Zustand haltet, widert mich an. Schluss damit."

languages.text: « Aussi dépravé qu'il ait pu être, je trouve répugnant qu'un xénos comme vous l'oblige à rester dans cet état pitoyable. Ça suffit. »
languages.original_text: "Reprobate though he was, the thought of you, a xenos, keeping him in such a wretched state is repulsive to me. No more."

traits.locale_text: « Aussi dépravé qu'il ait pu être, je trouve répugnant qu'un xénos comme vous l'oblige à rester dans cet état pitoyable. Ça suffit. »

languages.text: "Kaltabanlık etmiş olsa da bir zenonun onu bu hâlde tutmasına katlanamıyorum. Yeter."
languages.original_text: "Reprobate though he was, the thought of you, a xenos, keeping him in such a wretched state is repulsive to me. No more."

traits.locale_text: "Kaltabanlık etmiş olsa da bir zenonun onu bu hâlde tutmasına katlanamıyorum. Yeter."
